infoSection.title: About us
infoSection.aboutParagraph1: Public organization "The Ukrainian Center" was founded on December 1, 2023.
infoSection.aboutParagraph2: We joined forces to make this project a reality. Thanks to the support of the USF Foundation and its founder with a big heart, Agnes Sirg, who has been helping Ukrainian women and children since the first days of the full-scale invasion, we began to actively work on the development of the Ukrainian community in PÃ¤rnu.
